it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Interface ClientInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NetworkHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIClient, SocketClient

    public interface ClientInterface
extends NetworkHandler
    This interface will be implemented accordly with user's Network choice
    Author:
    Francesco Masciulli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void changeUsername(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String newUsername)
      this method update the username after a modification request
      void connectClient()
      this method handle the lookup and the creation of the client RemoteRegistry calling the method on the server to add the Remote reference to this last created registry;
      void disconnectClient()
      this method handle the ClientInterface disconnection
      boolean isConnected()
      Getter method:
      void reconnectClient()
      This method reconnect the client to the requested port, on the same server

    • Method Detail

      • connectClient

        void connectClient()
            throws java.net.ConnectException
        this method handle the lookup and the creation of the client RemoteRegistry calling the method on the server to add the Remote reference to this last created registry;
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException - if couldn't connect properly

      • disconnectClient

        void disconnectClient()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        this method handle the ClientInterface disconnection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - is couldn't disconnect properly
